description: It doesn't get any easier than this picnic-worthy potato salad recipe, also perfect as a side dish at lunch or dinner.
keywords: Potato salad,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Video,Low sugar,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Potato,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Easy Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potatoes according to packet instructions.
Place vinegar, mustard and garlic in a small bowl, whisking with a fork until combined. Slowly add oil, whisking until combined.
Place potatoes in a bowl and drizzle over dressing, tossing to combine. Scatter over dill, thinly sliced onion and capers, then season and serve.
